attributes.action: to encourage the study of the works of Neil Peart within english literature courses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Neil Peart, one of the finest wordsmiths still alive to-day, would be one of the finest authors for young British students to study. His works makes such works as Ayn Rand, Shakespeare, Dickens and other great writers more accessible to a new generation.
